pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Advanced Anti-Ageing Revitalising Hydration Face Cream 50g
pageProduct.description:
Information

REGENERIST DEEP HYDRATION CREAM MOISTURISER

IMMEDIATELY SOFTENS LOOK OF FINE LINES & WRINKLES WITH LONG LASTING HYDRATION

Regenerist is Olay's Advanced Anti-Ageing Collection. The supercharged Regenerist formulas, with key anti-ageing ingredients like amino-peptides, are engineered to regenerate surface skin cells and deliver visible, transformative results for younger-looking skin.

DEEPLY HYDRATING ANTI-AGEING FORMULA

Olay Regenerist Advanced Anti-Ageing Deep Hydration Regenerating Cream Moisturiser outlast your entire day with long-lasting moisture and skin=softening benefits. Its hydrating formula keeps your skin moisturised and immediately softens the look of fine lines and wrinkles. The cream's Amino-Peptide Complex delivers moisturising ingredients 10 layers deep into skin's surface. Plus, it's exfoliating properties aid in surface cell turnover and help regenerate surface skin cells. Its expert formula is non-greasy and absorbs quickly into skin's surface.

INGREDIENTS, RESULTS & REGIMEN

Olay Regenerist Regenerating Deep Hydration Cream moisturises skin all day to reveal younger-looking skin with its super-hydrating formula. Newer, younger-looking skin is revealed and appearance of fine lines and wrinkles is visibly improved.

Olay Regenerist Regenerating Deep Hydration Cream is just one of many beneficial steps you can take to improve your skin's appearance. Customise your own anti-ageing regimen with advanced cleansers, serums, eye/specialty treatments to target skincare concerns, and moisturisers.

Feel smoother skin and instantly see a brighter complexion that's primed for your anti-ageing regimen. Over time, you'll see skin's texture improve.

COMPLETE YOUR ADVANCED ANTI-AGEING REGIMEN

General Information

Olay Regenerist Advanced Anti-Ageing Revitalising Hydration Face Cream Moisturiser provides daytime hydration with non-greasy feel. Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days!

Formula helps to:


- Renew skin's youthful look.


- Reduce fine line and wrinkle appearance with moisturisation.


- Exfoliate and smooth skin.


- Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days


Product Attributes:


- Rich feel.


- Easily absorbing.


- Non-greasy.


Technology:


Formula with Amino-peptide Complex helps renew skin's surface.


For more information on this moisturiser and other Regenerist products to complete your skincare regimen go to Olay.com.

Product Claims: Look up to 10 years younger in just 4 weeks

Size: 50g

KEY FEATURES

• Renew skin's youthful look.
• Reduce fine line and wrinkle appearance with moisturiser.
• Exfoliate and smooth skin.
• Rich feel.
• Easy-absorbing.
• Non-greasy.





Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes.

Ingredients

Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Polymethylsilsequioxane, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Panthenol, Polyethylene, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Titanium Dioxide, DMDM Hydantoin, Fragrance, Allantoin, Dimethiconol, Laureth-7, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Laureth-4, Triethanolamine, Sodium PEG-7 Olive Oil Carboxylate, Disodium EDTA, PEG-100 Stearate, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, CI 19140, CI 16035.

Directions

Using your fingertips, smooth evenly onto clean skin over face and neck, once or twice a day.

USAGE ADVICE

Choose from among the following regimen steps from Regenerist:
1. Cleanser: Designed to gently remove dirt and make-up leaving skin purified and prepared for the rest of your routine.
2. Serum: Designed to be lightweight so they can be layered on the skin before your traditional moisturiser. Easily absorbs and delivers anti-aging ingredients into skin's epidermis layer.
3. Moisturiser: Designed for long-lasting hydration and offered in 3 types - Day, UV, and Night.
4. Eye/Treatment: Eye: Use after your moisturiser to hydrate the eye area and address key eye concerns.
Treatments: Specially designed with advanced ingredients/technology to treat specific skin concerns. Add these to further customise your skincare regimen.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
